reportTitle: Fashion Store Visit Summary Report [CQ - Aug 2024]

visit.overview: Customer visited the store to explore the latest fall collection and inquire about custom tailoring services.
keyFindings: Customer showed interest in high-end designer wear, especially evening gowns.
Customer is planning a wedding and looking for bridal and bridesmaids' dresses.
Inquired about fabric options for custom-made suits.
Requested matching accessories (shoes, handbags) to complement evening wear.
recommendations: Present the customer with designer evening gowns for upcoming events.
Discuss custom tailoring options for bridal and bridesmaids' dresses.
Offer a consultation for a custom-made suit, including fabric selection and fitting schedule.
Showcase matching accessories for the selected outfits (shoes, handbags, jewelry).
Schedule a follow-up appointment for further consultation and fittings.
visit.compositions: Details of the customerâ€™s style preferences, including material, fit, and color choices for each outfit.
visit.coverages: Information about potential discounts or offers, including loyalty rewards and upcoming sales events.
visit.document: Purchase documents, order forms for custom designs, and customer preference sheets.
visit.encounters: Interactions with sales representatives and in-store stylists, including details of personalized fashion advice and consultation on custom tailoring.
visit.fashionHistory: Past purchases, including evening wear and casual outfits, and customer preferences in brands and designers.

notes.stylistNotes: Customer prefers a classic, elegant look with a modern twist, particularly for evening and bridal wear.
notes.followUpPlan: Customer to be contacted within one week for a consultation on bridal wear designs and fabric options.

tableData.description: Cozy pajamas set with cartoon designs

shoppingPreferences.onlineShopping: Occasionally shops online but prefers in-store experiences.

styleGoals: Create a custom suit for upcoming formal events.
Explore matching accessories for evening wear.

customerEducation.fabricCare: Guidance on caring for high-end fabrics and proper storage for custom-made outfits.
customerEducation.tailoringProcess: Overview of the custom tailoring process, including measurements and fabric selection.
